entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022
